long_description: The CYFY Cycle Products Wristview mirror offers portable, easy viewing of what's behind you when you're riding, and uses a reflective wrist strap to increase your visibility. Mirror is mounted to a flexible, felt-backed reflective wrist strap that makes it easy to take the mirror along with you on any ride. Wrist-mounting is fast and convenient: simply straighten the wrist strap, place mirror on wrist and collapse and adjust the strap for a secure fit. To use mirror, just lift your hand and direct the mirror so that you can see behind you-it's that easy! Reflective strap enhances your visibility when making hand signals and in low light.
